vernac_cmds: Definition to_Z x := x mod wB.
Notation "[| x |]" := (to_Z x) (at level 0, x at level 99).
Notation "[+| c |]" := (interp_carry 1 wB to_Z c) (at level 0, c at level 99).
Notation "[-| c |]" := (interp_carry (-1) wB to_Z c) (at level 0, c at level 99).
Notation "[|| x ||]" := (zn2z_to_Z wB to_Z x) (at level 0, x at level 99).
generalize digits_ne_1; destruct digits; red; auto.
unfold wB, base; auto with zarith.
unfold to_Z; intros; destruct (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos); auto.
unfold to_Z; intros; destruct (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos); auto.
Definition of_pos x := let (q,r) := Z.pos_div_eucl x wB in (N_of_Z q, r).
Lemma spec_of_pos : forall p, Zpos p = (Z.of_N (fst (of_pos p)))*wB + [|(snd (of_pos p))|].
replace z with (Zpos p / wB) by (symmetry; apply Zdiv_unique with z0; auto).
replace (Z.of_N (N_of_Z z)) with z by (destruct z; simpl; auto; elim H1; auto).
apply Zmod_small; generalize wB_pos; auto with zarith.
apply Zmod_small; split; auto with zarith.
apply Zmod_small; split; auto with zarith.
cut (1 <= 2 ^ Zpos digits); auto with zarith.
apply Z.le_trans with (Zpos digits); auto with zarith.
Lemma spec_compare : forall x y, compare x y = Z.compare [|x|] [|y|].
Definition eq0 x := match [|x|] with Z0 => true | _ => false end.
Lemma spec_eq0 : forall x, eq0 x = true -> [|x|] = 0.
Definition opp_c x := if eq0 x then C0 0 else C1 (- x).
intro H0; rewrite H0 in H; discriminate.
Lemma spec_opp : forall x, [|opp x|] = (-[|x|]) mod wB.
change ((- x) mod wB = (0 - (x mod wB)) mod wB).
Lemma spec_opp_carry : forall x, [|opp_carry x|] = wB - [|x|] - 1.
replace (- x - 1) with (- 1 - x) by omega.
replace ( -1 - x mod wB) with (0 + ( -1 - x mod wB)) by omega.
replace (wB + (-1 - x mod wB)) with (wB - x mod wB -1) by omega.
Definition succ_c x := let y := Z.succ x in if eq0 y then C1 0 else C0 y.
Definition add_c x y := let z := [|x|] + [|y|] in if Z_lt_le_dec z wB then C0 z else C1 (z-wB).
Definition add_carry_c x y := let z := [|x|]+[|y|]+1 in if Z_lt_le_dec z wB then C0 z else C1 (z-wB).
Definition add_carry x y := x + y + 1.
Lemma Zmod_equal : forall x y z, z>0 -> (x-y) mod z = 0 -> x mod z = y mod z.
generalize (Z_div_mod_eq (x-y) z H); rewrite H0, Z.add_0_r.
replace (wB + 0 mod wB) with wB by auto with zarith.
assert ((x+1) mod wB = 0) by (apply spec_eq0; auto).
replace (wB-1) with ((wB-1) mod wB) by (apply Zmod_small; generalize wB_pos; omega).
rewrite <- Zminus_mod_idemp_l; rewrite Z_mod_same; simpl; auto.
unfold eq0, to_Z in *; now destruct ((x+1) mod wB).
rewrite Z.add_move_r in H0; simpl in H0.
replace (wB-1+1) with wB; auto with zarith; apply Z_mod_same; auto.
Lemma spec_add_c : forall x y, [+|add_c x y|] = [|x|] + [|y|].
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
Lemma spec_add_carry_c : forall x y, [+|add_carry_c x y|] = [|x|] + [|y|] + 1.
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
Lemma spec_succ : forall x, [|succ x|] = ([|x|] + 1) mod wB.
Lemma spec_add : forall x y, [|add x y|] = ([|x|] + [|y|]) mod wB.
intros; unfold add, to_Z; apply Zplus_mod.
Lemma spec_add_carry : forall x y, [|add_carry x y|] = ([|x|] + [|y|] + 1) mod wB.
Definition pred_c x := if eq0 x then C1 (wB-1) else C0 (x-1).
Definition sub_c x y := let z := [|x|]-[|y|] in if Z_lt_le_dec z 0 then C1 (wB+z) else C0 z.
Definition sub_carry_c x y := let z := [|x|]-[|y|]-1 in if Z_lt_le_dec z 0 then C1 (wB+z) else C0 z.
Definition sub_carry x y := x - y - 1.
replace ((wB-1) mod wB) with (wB-1); auto with zarith.
symmetry; apply Zmod_small; generalize wB_pos; omega.
unfold eq0, to_Z in *; now destruct (x mod wB).
Lemma spec_sub_c : forall x y, [-|sub_c x y|] = [|x|] - [|y|].
replace ((wB + (x mod wB - y mod wB)) mod wB) with (wB + (x mod wB - y mod wB)).
generalize wB_pos (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
generalize wB_pos (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
Lemma spec_sub_carry_c : forall x y, [-|sub_carry_c x y|] = [|x|] - [|y|] - 1.
replace ((wB + (x mod wB - y mod wB - 1)) mod wB) with (wB + (x mod wB - y mod wB -1)).
generalize wB_pos (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
generalize wB_pos (Z_mod_lt x wB wB_pos) (Z_mod_lt y wB wB_pos); omega.
Lemma spec_pred : forall x, [|pred x|] = ([|x|] - 1) mod wB.
Lemma spec_sub : forall x y, [|sub x y|] = ([|x|] - [|y|]) mod wB.
intros; unfold sub, to_Z; apply Zminus_mod.
Lemma spec_sub_carry : forall x y, [|sub_carry x y|] = ([|x|] - [|y|] - 1) mod wB.
Definition mul_c x y := let (h,l) := Z.div_eucl ([|x|]*[|y|]) wB in if eq0 h then if eq0 l then W0 else WW h l else WW h l.
Definition square_c x := mul_c x x.
Lemma spec_mul_c : forall x y, [|| mul_c x y ||] = [|x|] * [|y|].
unfold Z.modulo, Z.div; destruct Z.div_eucl; auto.
generalize (Z_div_mod ([|x|]*[|y|]) wB wB_pos); destruct Z.div_eucl as (h,l).
rewrite <- H3, <- H4, (spec_eq0 h), (spec_eq0 l); auto with zarith.
rewrite H3, H4; auto with zarith.
rewrite H3, H4; auto with zarith.
Lemma spec_mul : forall x y, [|mul x y|] = ([|x|] * [|y|]) mod wB.
intros; unfold mul, to_Z; apply Zmult_mod.
Lemma spec_square_c : forall x, [|| square_c x||] = [|x|] * [|x|].
Lemma spec_div : forall a b, 0 < [|b|] -> let (q,r) := div a b in [|a|] = [|q|] * [|b|] + [|r|] /\ 0 <= [|r|] < [|b|].
unfold Z.modulo, Z.div; destruct Z.div_eucl; auto.
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt b wB wB_pos); fold [|b|]; auto with zarith.
apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg; generalize wB_pos; auto with zarith.
rewrite H5, H6; rewrite Z.mul_comm; auto with zarith.
Lemma spec_div_gt : forall a b, [|a|] > [|b|] -> 0 < [|b|] -> let (q,r) := div_gt a b in [|a|] = [|q|] * [|b|] + [|r|] /\ 0 <= [|r|] < [|b|].
Lemma spec_modulo : forall a b, 0 < [|b|] -> [|modulo a b|] = [|a|] mod [|b|].
Lemma spec_modulo_gt : forall a b, [|a|] > [|b|] -> 0 < [|b|] -> [|modulo_gt a b|] = [|a|] mod [|b|].
Lemma Zgcd_bound : forall a b, 0<=a -> 0<=b -> Z.gcd a b <= Z.max a b.
destruct H2 as (q,H2); destruct H3 as (q',H3); clear H4.
apply Z.mul_le_mono_pos_r with (Z.gcd a b); auto with zarith.
subst q; simpl in *; subst a; simpl; auto.
Lemma spec_gcd : forall a b, Zis_gcd [|a|] [|b|] [|gcd a b|].
generalize (Z_mod_lt a wB wB_pos)(Z_mod_lt b wB wB_pos); intros.
Lemma spec_gcd_gt : forall a b, [|a|] > [|b|] -> Zis_gcd [|a|] [|b|] [|gcd_gt a b|].
Definition div21 a1 a2 b := Z.div_eucl ([|a1|]*wB+[|a2|]) [|b|].
generalize (Z_mod_lt a1 wB wB_pos); fold [|a1|]; intros.
generalize (Z_mod_lt a2 wB wB_pos); fold [|a2|]; intros.
unfold Z.modulo, Z.div; destruct Z.div_eucl; auto.
apply Zmod_small; generalize (Z_mod_lt b wB wB_pos); fold [|b|]; auto with zarith.
apply Z.lt_le_trans with ([|a1|]*wB+wB); auto with zarith.
rewrite H8, H9; rewrite Z.mul_comm; auto with zarith.
Definition add_mul_div p x y := ([|x|] * (2 ^ [|p|]) + [|y|] / (2 ^ ((Zpos digits) - [|p|]))).
Lemma spec_add_mul_div : forall x y p, [|p|] <= Zpos digits -> [| add_mul_div p x y |] = ([|x|] * (2 ^ [|p|]) + [|y|] / (2 ^ ((Zpos digits) - [|p|]))) mod wB.
Lemma spec_pos_mod : forall w p, [|pos_mod p w|] = [|w|] mod (2 ^ [|p|]).
destruct H; auto using Z.lt_gt with zarith.
apply Z.le_lt_trans with [|w|]; auto with zarith.
Definition is_even x := if Z.eq_dec ([|x|] mod 2) 0 then true else false.
Lemma spec_is_even : forall x, if is_even x then [|x|] mod 2 = 0 else [|x|] mod 2 = 1.
intros; unfold is_even; destruct Z.eq_dec; auto.
Lemma spec_sqrt : forall x, [|sqrt x|] ^ 2 <= [|x|] < ([|sqrt x|] + 1) ^ 2.

Definition sqrt2 x y := let z := [|x|]*wB+[|y|] in match z with | Z0 => (0, C0 0) | Zpos p => let (s,r) := Z.sqrtrem (Zpos p) in (s, if Z_lt_le_dec r wB then C0 r else C1 (r-wB)) | Zneg _ => (0, C0 0) end.
Lemma spec_sqrt2 : forall x y, wB/ 4 <= [|x|] -> let (s,r) := sqrt2 x y in [||WW x y||] = [|s|] ^ 2 + [+|r|] /\ [+|r|] <= 2 * [|s|].
destruct Z.sqrtrem as (s,r); intros [U V]; auto with zarith.
apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg; generalize wB_pos; auto with zarith.
replace [|s|] with s by (symmetry; apply Zmod_small; auto with zarith).
replace [|r|] with r by (symmetry; apply Zmod_small; auto with zarith).
replace [|r-wB|] with (r-wB) by (symmetry; apply Zmod_small; auto with zarith).
rewrite Heqz; generalize wB_pos; auto with zarith.
compute in H0; elim H0; auto.
Lemma two_p_power2 : forall x, x>=0 -> two_p x = 2 ^ x.
Definition head0 x := match [|x|] with | Z0 => zdigits | Zpos p => zdigits - log_inf p - 1 | _ => 0 end.
Lemma spec_head00: forall x, [|x|] = 0 -> [|head0 x|] = Zpos digits.
Lemma log_inf_bounded : forall x p, Zpos x < 2^p -> log_inf x < p.
assert (0 < p) by (destruct p; compute; auto with zarith; discriminate).
change (Zpos x~1) with (2*(Zpos x)+1) in H.
replace p with (Z.succ (p-1)) in H; auto with zarith.
rewrite Z.pow_succ_r in H; auto with zarith.
assert (0 < p) by (destruct p; compute; auto with zarith; discriminate).
change (Zpos x~0) with (2*(Zpos x)) in H.
replace p with (Z.succ (p-1)) in H; auto with zarith.
rewrite Z.pow_succ_r in H; auto with zarith.
simpl; intros; destruct p; compute; auto with zarith.
Lemma spec_head0 : forall x, 0 < [|x|] -> wB/ 2 <= 2 ^ ([|head0 x|]) * [|x|] < wB.
rewrite 2 two_p_power2 in H2; auto with zarith.
unfold zdigits, wB, base; apply Zpower2_lt_lin; auto with zarith.
apply Z.le_trans with (2^(zdigits - log_inf p - 1)*(2^log_inf p)).
rewrite Z.mul_comm; rewrite <- Z.pow_succ_r; auto with zarith.
replace (Z.succ (zdigits - log_inf p -1 +log_inf p)) with zdigits by ring.
unfold wB, base, zdigits; auto with zarith.
apply Z.lt_le_trans with (2^(zdigits - log_inf p - 1)*(2^(Z.succ (log_inf p)))).
replace (zdigits - log_inf p -1 +Z.succ (log_inf p)) with zdigits by ring.
unfold wB, base, zdigits; auto with zarith.
Fixpoint Ptail p := match p with | xO p => (Ptail p)+1 | _ => 0 end.
Lemma Ptail_pos : forall p, 0 <= Ptail p.
induction p; simpl; auto with zarith.
Lemma Ptail_bounded : forall p d, Zpos p < 2^(Zpos d) -> Ptail p < Zpos d.
compute in H; destruct p; discriminate.
rewrite H1 in H0; elim H0; auto.
apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r with 2; auto with zarith.
Definition tail0 x := match [|x|] with | Z0 => zdigits | Zpos p => Ptail p | Zneg _ => 0 end.
Lemma spec_tail00: forall x, [|x|] = 0 -> [|tail0 x|] = Zpos digits.
Lemma spec_tail0 : forall x, 0 < [|x|] -> exists y, 0 <= y /\ [|x|] = (2 * y + 1) * (2 ^ [|tail0 x|]).
exists (Zpos p); simpl; rewrite Pos.mul_1_r; auto with zarith.
Lemma spec_lor x y : [|lor x y|] = Z.lor [|x|] [|y|].
Lemma spec_land x y : [|land x y|] = Z.land [|x|] [|y|].
Lemma spec_lxor x y : [|lxor x y|] = Z.lxor [|x|] [|y|].

Instance zmod_ops : ZnZ.Ops Z := ZnZ.MkOps (digits : positive) (zdigits: t) (to_Z : t -> Z) (of_pos : positive -> N * t) (head0 : t -> t) (tail0 : t -> t) (zero : t) (one : t) (minus_one : t) (compare : t -> t -> comparison) (eq0 : t -> bool) (opp_c : t -> carry t) (opp : t -> t) (opp_carry : t -> t) (succ_c : t -> carry t) (add_c : t -> t -> carry t) (add_carry_c : t -> t -> carry t) (succ : t -> t) (add : t -> t -> t) (add_carry : t -> t -> t) (pred_c : t -> carry t) (sub_c : t -> t -> carry t) (sub_carry_c : t -> t -> carry t) (pred : t -> t) (sub : t -> t -> t) (sub_carry : t -> t -> t) (mul_c : t -> t -> zn2z t) (mul : t -> t -> t) (square_c : t -> zn2z t) (div21 : t -> t -> t -> t*t) (div_gt : t -> t -> t * t) (div : t -> t -> t * t) (modulo_gt : t -> t -> t) (modulo : t -> t -> t) (gcd_gt : t -> t -> t) (gcd : t -> t -> t) (add_mul_div : t -> t -> t -> t) (pos_mod : t -> t -> t) (is_even : t -> bool) (sqrt2 : t -> t -> t * carry t) (sqrt : t -> t) (lor : t -> t -> t) (land : t -> t -> t) (lxor : t -> t -> t).

Instance zmod_specs : ZnZ.Specs zmod_ops := ZnZ.MkSpecs spec_to_Z spec_of_pos spec_zdigits spec_more_than_1_digit spec_0 spec_1 spec_Bm1 spec_compare spec_eq0 spec_opp_c spec_opp spec_opp_carry spec_succ_c spec_add_c spec_add_carry_c spec_succ spec_add spec_add_carry spec_pred_c spec_sub_c spec_sub_carry_c spec_pred spec_sub spec_sub_carry spec_mul_c spec_mul spec_square_c spec_div21 spec_div_gt spec_div spec_modulo_gt spec_modulo spec_gcd_gt spec_gcd spec_head00 spec_head0 spec_tail00 spec_tail0 spec_add_mul_div spec_pos_mod spec_is_even spec_sqrt2 spec_sqrt spec_lor spec_land spec_lxor.
Instance ops : ZnZ.Ops t := zmod_ops P.p.
Instance specs : ZnZ.Specs ops := zmod_specs P.not_one.
